pkgmetadata.longdescription: python-dlinfo=============Python wrapper for libc's dlinfoInstall-------.. code:: sh pip install dlinfo # or pipenv install dlinfoUsage-----.. code:: python >>> from dlinfo import DLInfo >>> lib = ctypes.cdll.LoadLibrary(ctypes.util.find_library('c')) >>> dlinfo = DLInfo(lib) >>> dlinfo.path '/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6'
